data.title: Ruthenium-catalyzed dimerization of propiolates: A simple route to α-pyrones
data.text:
TY - JOUR

T1 - Ruthenium-catalyzed dimerization of propiolates

T2 - A simple route to α-pyrones

AU - Manikandan, Rajendran

AU - Jeganmohan, Masilamani

PY - 2014/2/7

Y1 - 2014/2/7

N2 - A ruthenium-catalyzed regioselective intermolecular multistep homo- and heterodimerization of substituted propiolates providing α-pyrone-5- carboxylates and α-pyrone-6-carboxylates is described. The synthetic utilities of α-pyrone derivatives are shown. The proposed mechanism is strongly supported by experimental evidence.

AB - A ruthenium-catalyzed regioselective intermolecular multistep homo- and heterodimerization of substituted propiolates providing α-pyrone-5- carboxylates and α-pyrone-6-carboxylates is described. The synthetic utilities of α-pyrone derivatives are shown. The proposed mechanism is strongly supported by experimental evidence.
